name: GKPBreakout
description:
You are in an art gallery when you see a breakout style game. You decide to give it a go. In the game you are breaking blocks inspired by the artist Georg Karl Pfahler. When you have finished a level you are left with a blank canvas. Why don't you go create something of your own?

This is a game that was made for a school project. I'm a student at SAE in Brisbane. The objective was to create a breakout style game based on the art from an assigned artist. I have created this project alone with help from my lecturers. Some of the artwork is taken directly from Georg Karl Pfahler and some are created in their likeness. I hope you enjoy this little experience and I hope that you can find your blank canvas.
